articles.title: What is temporary protected status and who is affected by Trump’s crackdown?
articles.description: The Biden administration dramatically expanded TPS, but it is the latest target in Trump’s anti-immigrant crusade
articles.content:
Millions of people live legally in the United States under various forms of temporary legal protection. Many have been targeted in the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown.
The latest move has been against people who have what’s known as “tem... [3994 chars]

articles.title: ‘Without time, there is no flavour’: a South Korean grand master on the art of the perfect soy sauce
articles.description: Ki Soon-do’s soy sauce has been served to Donald Trump and gained Unesco heritage protection. It is recognition that is 370 years in the making
articles.content:
In the lush foothills of Damyang county, South Jeolla province, rows of earthenware jars stand under the Korean sky. Inside each clay vessel, a quiet transformation is taking place, one that has been occurring on this land for centuries.

articles.title: Trump uses White House meeting to confront South African president over farmers
articles.description: The bilateral relationship is at its lowest point since South Africa enforced its apartheid system of racial segregation, which ended in 1994.
